channel.title: Career on Pennydropper - Lightbulb moments in Data Science

item.title: Melbourne Data Science Conference 2018
item.description: The 2018 Melbourne Data Science Conference (MeDaScIn Conference) featured data science career advice from 6 presenters. Overall, the conference presented some good common sense career advice though there was little “new” material. This blog post shows notes taken during the presentations. The conference website was down at the time of writing this blog but the link is provided anyway. Scott Wilson: How to Engage Executives and the Boardroom Scott Wilson, the founder of Wilson AI, presented on “How to Engage Executives and the Boardroom”.
